hero.title: Pricing Plans for {website.name}
hero.description:
Choose the perfect plan to unlock the power of royalty investments with {website.name}.
Flexible options designed for investors and creators alike.

items.name: Free Plan
items.description: Get started with basic access to {website.name}’s marketplace.

items.name: Pro Plan
items.description: Enhanced access for serious investors and creators.

items.name: All Access Membership
items.description: Premium access for building a robust royalty portfolio.

items.question: What is included in the Free Plan?
items.answer: The Free Plan provides access to public listings, basic market insights, limited bidding opportunities, and standard support to help you get started with {website.name}.

items.question: How do I upgrade to the Pro Plan or All Access Membership?
items.answer: To upgrade, contact our team through the Contact Us page. We’ll guide you through the process and provide tailored pricing details based on your needs.

items.question: Can I switch plans later?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time by contacting our support team. Changes will take effect at the start of the next billing cycle.

items.question: Does {website.name} offer refunds?
items.answer: Refunds are handled on a case-by-case basis. Please refer to our Terms of Use or contact support for more information on our refund policy.
